page.title: 06Employment-Witton&Ridlington
page.content: Jobs available locally include farmwork,though with the advent of mechanisation far fewer are employed. Younger people travel to N.Walsham to find employment in small industries.A variety of trades & professions are found amongst the inhabitants but in nearly all cases they travel outside the area. Self- employed people include dress-maker, carpenter & business services. {Seasonal Employment}Women are employed seasonally in catering for tourists, shopwork,chalet,caravan&house cleaning {Welfare services}Opportunities exist for employment as care assistants at the Rookery,a home for mentally handicapped people. {Unemployment}There is very little amongst the adult population:all but 4 teenagers have found employment,1 girl within a 2 weeks of finishing training
